title: War Zone Tracker
description: The War Zone Tracker is an interactive 3D webpage for observing where battles took place throughout various wars in world history.
By taking advantage of different techniques with GLSL and framebuffers, the user is able to click on the 3D spheres to obtain more information about the individual battles.
This independent project helped to build on WebGL javascript backends from the planetary terrains and AtomicGL pages to allow for more functionality and productivity in future projects.
